mapper.select: select j.`order_date`, j.`bed_count`, k.`lease_count`, k.`rent_count` from ( select convert(create_time, date) as `order_date`, count(*) as `bed_count` from tb_jp_bed group by `order_date` ) j left join ( select convert(pay_time,date) as `order_date`, count(*) as `lease_count`, sum(totalpay) as `rent_count` from tb_jp_orders where orders_status = '已完成' group by `order_date` ) k on j.`order_date` = k.`order_date` order by j.`order_date` desc

select j.`order_date`, j.`bed_count`, k.`lease_count`, k.`rent_count` from ( select year(create_time) as `order_date`, count(*) as `bed_count` from tb_jp_bed group by `order_date` ) j left join ( select year(pay_time) as `order_date`, count(*) as `lease_count`, sum(totalpay) as `rent_count` from tb_jp_orders where orders_status = '已完成' group by `order_date` ) k on j.`order_date` = k.`order_date` order by j.`order_date` desc
